title: Looking For Polar Bears: Clancy, Pfeffer and Sheckard
author: rommesc

posts.post_title: Looking For Polar Bears: Clancy, Pfeffer and Sheckard
posts.post_content:
Working on the T206 Polar Bear subset.  Looking for Clancy, Pfeffer, and Sheckard in poor-good condition along with a few others.  Please let me know if you are interested in working out a trade or sale on any of these cards.  

Best Regards,
Chris
Bump - Added a Miller PB to my subset via T206 trade.  Thank you again Doug!
Still looking for Clancy, Pfeffer, and Sheckard with Polar Bear backs.
